portraitResource.label: Portrait Bar
portraitResource.hint: Resource bar that will be shown as a overlay on top of the portrait image, set to 'None' to disable.

alwaysShowActions.name: Show enemy action points
alwaysShowActions.hint: If 'Show system icons' is enabled, show action points to players regardless of permissions. This will allow players to see how many total and remaining action points allies and enemies have. Focus points will still be hidden from players without permission to see them.

portraitSize.name: Carousel Size
portraitSize.hint: The maximum size of the portraits in the carousel. Note that the size of the portraits will be automatically reduced if there are too many combatants to fit on the screen.

carouselStyle.name: Carousel Style
carouselStyle.hint:
The way portraits are placed and move in the carousel: Carousel - Centered: The Active Combatant is at the Center of the carousel, the other combatants rotate around it.
- Carousel - Left: The Active Combatant is at the Left of the carousel, the other combatants rotate around it.
- No Carousel: Combatants are always displayed in initiative order and the active combatant moves around while combatants remain in the same position.

overflowStyle.name: Overflow Style
overflowStyle.hint: The way the carousel behaves when there are too many combatants to fit on the screen.

portraitAspect.name: Portrait Aspect Ratio
portraitAspect.hint: The aspect ratio of the portrait. The image will be cropped if it doesn't match the aspect ratio of the portrait.

roundness.name: Roundness
roundness.hint: The roundness of the portraits and tooltips.

showDispositionColor.name: Show Disposition Color
showDispositionColor.hint: Show the disposition in the bottom border of the portrait.

hideDefeated.name: Hide Defeated
hideDefeated.hint: Hide defeated combatants from the carousel. They will still be visible in the regular combat tracker in the event that you need to interact with them.

showInitiativeOnPortrait.name: Show Initiative on Portrait
showInitiativeOnPortrait.hint: Show the initiative value in the top left corner of the portrait. You can always see the initiative in the Tooltip!

portraitImageBorder.name: Player Border
portraitImageBorder.hint: Special border that will be shown for player characters. Leave blank to disable. If you wish to make a custom image, it's suggested you use the default one as reference for correct sizing.

attributeColor.name: Attribute Color
attributeColor.hint: The color of the main tracked attribute text and bar in the carousel. You can use any valid CSS color value (eg. #ff0000, red, rgba(255,0,0,0.5), etc).

attributeColor2.name: Secondary Attribute Color
attributeColor2.hint: The color of the secondary tracked attribute text and bar in the carousel. You can use any valid CSS color value (eg. #ff0000, red, rgba(255,0,0,0.5), etc).

attributeColorPortrait.name: Portrait Attribute Color
attributeColorPortrait.hint: The color of the tracked attribute portrait overlay bar. You can use any valid CSS color value (eg. #ff0000, red, rgba(255,0,0,0.5), etc).

barsPlacement.name: Bars Placement
barsPlacement.hint: The placement of the tracked attributes bars in the carousel.

attributeVisibility.name: Attribute Visibility
attributeVisibility.hint: The visibility of the tracked attributes in the carousel.

playerPlayerPermission.name: Always Show Player Info
playerPlayerPermission.hint: Allow all players to see the tracked attributes, tooltip information and system icons of other players.

displayDescriptions.name: Show Descriptions
displayDescriptions.hint: Show active effects descriptions in the tooltip.

tooltipColor.name: Tooltip Color
tooltipColor.hint: The color scheme of the tooltip. You can use any valid CSS color value (eg. #ff0000, red, rgba(255,0,0,0.5), etc). Default #888888.

portraitImage.name: Portrait Image
portraitImage.hint: Whether to use the Actor or Token image as the portrait.

portraitImageBackground.name: Portrait Background
portraitImageBackground.hint: The background image behind the portrait that will be visible if the portrait is transparent or doesn't fill the space.

showSystemIcons.name: Show System Icons
showSystemIcons.hint: Show the system icons below the tracked resource, tooltip or both. Keep in mind that this requires a system specific implementation and will only work on select systems.

displayName.name: Display Name
displayName.hint: Whether or not to display the name of the combatant in the tooltip. 'Based on Token' will display the name only if the player can see the name of the token.

hideFirstRound.name: Hide Until First Turn
hideFirstRound.hint: Hide enemies until they have taken their first turn in combat. (Requires LibWrapper to hide them in the core combat tracker as well.)

attributesMenu.name: Tooltip Attributes
attributesMenu.label: Configure Attributes
attributesMenu.hint: Configure custom attributes to show in the tooltip.
attributesMenu.resetWarning: Are you sure you want to reset the attributes to their default values?

form.notes: Leave the Attribute field blank to remove it.

add-event.title: Add Event
add-event.error: Error: You must provide a name, an image and initiative value for the event.

combat-tracker-dock.deleteEffectContent: Are you sure you want to delete the effect
